<section>
    <nav>
        <button id="new" (click)="navigateToNewBorrow()">
            + New Borrow
        </button>
        <button id="book" (click)="navigateBookComponent()">
            Book List
        </button>
        <button id="book" (click)="navigateUserComponent()">
            User List
        </button>
    </nav>  

    <app-borrow-read></app-borrow-read>
</section>
